ygData.subject: Re: Manastone usage?
ygData.msgSnippet: Manastone: 2HP - 1HP Superior Heal 250MP - 600HP Work out the math. =) ... From: Paul Heenan  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Manastone:

2HP -> 1HP

Superior Heal
250MP -> 600HP

Work out the math. =)

----- Original Message -----
From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
To: <eq-clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, September 24, 1999 1:55 PM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Manastone usage?


> From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
>
> Hey guys,
>
> Does anybody have one of these Manastones? If so, exactly how do you use
it?
> Is there a strategy to it? If it converts HP to Mana, then how do you stay
> alive with less HP available? I read about high level Druids and Shaman
> using their "regeneration" line of spells to get HP back as they use it.
Is
> there a similar way to use it for us Clerics? Any tips would be
appreciated.
>
> Thanks,
> Drizben D'vorn
> Defiled Priest of Innoruuk
>
> >
